title: Best assassin jungler?
body: So I've recently come back to play league and yeah... I forgot about everything. So does know who the best assassin jungler is? In terms of damage.

replies.body: probably kayn for damage, evelynn for winrate, xin zhao for overall carry potential.
Statistically Evelyn is the best assassin jungler at the moment, if you only consider champs that have burst AND escape as assassins.
